sections.what: 这个模板把“单味中草药”做成一张可收藏的全景分解图：包含外观/断面/纹理细节、性味归经、核心功效标签、常见剂型与使用场景，并用清晰的科普信息图排版呈现。
sections.who: 适合中医药科普账号、养生内容创作者、药材店/品牌做知识海报、学生做学习笔记，以及想把药材讲清楚（但不想写长文）的用户。
how: 输入药材中文名+别名（如有）+常见形态（饮片/原药材）。
给出你想强调的模块：性味归经/主功效/鉴别要点/禁忌注意/现代剂型（颗粒、胶囊等）。
要求“分解视图”：外观、断面、纹理、关键部位用箭头标注；信息密度高但要可读。
生成后校对：术语是否一致（归经、功效标签）；如偏差，要求“按你提供的要点重写文案，不改画面风格”。
prompts: 生成《单味药材全景分解图》：药材“黄芪”，包含外观与断面纹理标注、性味归经、核心功效标签、常见剂型与使用场景、注意事项，3:4竖版，高信息密度科普排版。
做“当归”Herb Exploded Sheet：饮片结构、鉴别要点（颜色/气味/断面）、主功效、搭配思路（可选）、禁忌提示，清晰箭头注释，3:4。
生成“陈皮”分解图：产地与年份差异要点、外观纹理特写、性味归经、日常使用场景（泡茶/入膳），复古但清爽的中文信息图排版，3:4。

how: 确定主题与时间范围（如“人类演化”“手机形态演进”“AI模型迭代”）。

要求等距像素展厅：空间递进、展牌编号、阶段标题（可中英双语），并加小型图例/刻度尺。
生成后检查：阶段是否按时间顺序；如不顺，要求“保持画面风格不变，重新排列展牌与节点”。
prompts: 生成“人类演化博物馆”像素等距时间线：能人→直立人→海德堡人→尼安德特人→智人，包含每阶段标志性工具/特征与关键节点标牌，中英双语小标题，3:4竖版。

seo.meta_title: Pixel “Evolution Museum” Timeline Generator | Curify Nano
seo.meta_description: Create an isometric pixel-art “Evolution Museum” timeline where spatial progression represents historical stages—bilingual titles, key markers, and rich symbolic detail for comparison and education.

sections.what: This template turns a timeline into an isometric pixel-art “museum walk-through”: each hall represents an era/version with labeled exhibits, milestone plaques, icons, and compact comparisons—highly visual and easy to skim.
sections.who: Great for educators, history/science explainers, product teams showing version evolution, researchers presenting stage-by-stage change, and creators who want timelines that feel like a story space (not a list).
how: Pick a theme + time span (e.g., “human evolution”, “smartphone design”, “AI model releases”).
List 6–10 stages with a one-line key change + one signature artifact/icon per stage.
Ask for an isometric pixel museum: numbered halls, milestone plaques, clear typography, optional bilingual headings.
After generation, verify ordering and labels; if inconsistent, instruct: “keep the style, rearrange halls and milestone text only.”
prompts: Create an isometric pixel-art “Evolution Museum” timeline: Early Hominins → Homo habilis → Homo erectus → Neanderthals → Homo sapiens. Include exhibit icons, milestone plaques, and concise bilingual headings. Vertical 3:4.

Generate a “Smartphone Evolution Museum” timeline: feature phone → flip phone → early touchscreen → full-screen → foldables → AR glasses (concept). Each stage gets one iconic device silhouette + one key change. Vertical 3:4.
Make a “Web Framework Evolution Museum” timeline: jQuery → Backbone → Angular → React → Next.js → Server Components (concept). Add milestone markers and one-line takeaways. Vertical 3:4.

how: 输入目的地+出行天数+每一天的主要地点（按顺序）。
补充偏好：美食优先/亲子/摄影点/徒步/购物，并列出必须打卡的3–5个点。
要求地图风格：Q版治愈手绘、中文标注、每日路线用不同颜色/线型区分（可描述，不必指定具体色值）。
生成后检查：路线是否绕路、每天是否过满；如过满，让模型“把行程拆成上午/下午/晚间，并减少点位”。
prompts: 生成“东京 4天手绘旅行地图”：按Day1–Day4分区，标注景点、美食、住宿与交通方式，Q版治愈风，全中文标注，3:4竖版可打印。

seo.meta_title: Landmark Architecture HUD Infographic Generator | Curify Nano
seo.meta_description: Create a photo-based architectural infographic with dense HUD-style white technical annotations—measurements, materials, plans/sections, and engineering features in a clean vertical layout.

sections.what: This template transforms a landmark photo into a HUD-style technical breakdown: clean white callouts, numbered annotations, data panels, and mini plan/section windows—like a sci-fi engineering dossier.
sections.who: Ideal for architecture/design students (portfolio boards), urban/landmark explainers, museum/exhibit visuals, and creators who want “cool + precise” technical storytelling.
how: Provide the building name, location, and 3–5 features to highlight (structure, façade, span, circulation).
Add any known numbers (height, floors, materials). If unsure, label as “approx.” rather than guessing.
Request HUD styling: thin white lines, callout numbers, data panels, and a small plan/section inset. Vertical 3:4.
After generation, check readability; if labels overlap, ask to “move annotations to margins and extend leader lines.”
prompts: Create a “Burj Khalifa” architecture HUD infographic: photo + white technical annotations, data panels (height/floors/materials), structural system highlights, and a small section inset. Vertical 3:4.
Generate a “Sydney Opera House” HUD breakdown: shell geometry, construction modules, materials, and acoustic spaces. Include numbered callouts and a mini plan inset. Vertical 3:4.
Make a “Guggenheim Museum Bilbao” HUD board: façade system, structural concept, circulation highlights, and key dimensions (approx). Clean white overlays, vertical 3:4.
